item.description: This first meeting will be largely organizational, but I'd also like to present a banner ad plugin I wrote for Wordpress as an example of creating plugins and widgets. We will be meeting at 6:30 for an informal networking session, and then hold the presentation from 7:15 to 8:00. This first meeting will be held at my home in Lexington, so I'm limiting it to 25 people. If we end up with more than that being interested, we can hold future meetings at a larger site.
item.how_to_find_us: We are meeting in the pool house. Use the gate to the left of the driveway.

group.name: Manchester, NH WordPress Developers and Users

item.name: Boston WordPress Developers August Meetup
